instruction: Name a project management tool that can be used by a large team.
output: One project management tool that can be used by a large team is Asana. Asana is a web-based application designed to help teams simplify team collaboration and organize their tasks. It has features such as task lists, customized labels and due dates, custom fields, and automated reminders. It also has an extensive API and mobile applications so teams can work from anywhere, anytime.
